predict_diagnosis:
1. Metabolic disorders (e.g., mitochondrial diseases)
2. Genetic syndromes (e.g., Fragile X syndrome, Down syndrome)
3. Infectious diseases (e.g., neuroinfections, meningitis)
4. Neuromuscular disorders (e.g., muscular dystrophy, botulism)
5. Demyelinating diseases (e.g., multiple sclerosis, acute disseminated encephalomyelitis)
6. Vascular disorders (e.g., stroke, Moyamoya disease)
7. Craniofacial syndromes (e.g., Crouzon syndrome, Apert syndrome)
8. Skeletal disorders (e.g., osteogenesis imperfecta, Paget's disease)
9. Endocrine disorders (e.g., hypothyroidism, diabetes mellitus)
10. Disorders of the nervous system (e.g., brain tumors, neurodegenerative diseases)

Please note that this list is not exhaustive, and further evaluation and testing will be necessary to narrow down the diagnosis.
